alert.note: Alert for Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 27 at 6:16PM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 10 AM EST MONDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 25 below zero. * WHERE...Southeastern Saint Lawrence and Southern Franklin Counties in New York. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills on Monday morning could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The winter weather advisory for the area has been cancelled as snow has moved out of the area. However, plan on slippery road conditions from earlier snow along with areas of blowing snow which could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
